name: Happy Place: Tidy Simulator
description:
This short two week project is more than it seems.
Let me know if you find any bugs.

Input: Keyboard and mouse.

Currently available for Windows and OSX.

Artist Statement:

Our world is governed by the laws of physics and chemistry. But we all make our own worlds, in our minds. For those who struggle with Anxiety disorder, this world inside your head can be a nightmare. This game is a 3d space where those "rules" we create, are reality.
